description: Details required  for Condition 18 (Boundary Treatment) of planning permission 21/02109/FUL (Demolition of the existing dwelling and erection of new single dwelling)The following will be submitted: Discharge of Condition 18 - boundary treatment
decision_conditions: Please note - this discharge of condition does not grant any permission for any changes to the boundary as approved under 21/02109/FULReason: For the avoidance of doubt
